search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for iubenda (iubenda.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for iubenda is: https://www.iubenda.com/en/pricing【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
[Home](https://www.iubenda.com/en/) Pricing

* * *

Not sure what you need?

[Take this quiz](https://iubenda.typeform.com/to/x69UOgyK#exp_pricing_variant=2024-AB-STARTER)

Recommended plan

![Image 1](https://www.iubenda.com/assets/site/products/starter-tier-icon-299b9496e0d69ede2c06dd7fa05ed14242984d157998b380b0c2488e4e914ab7.svg)

Starter
-------

$3.49

per site/app, per month when billed annually

* * *

Choose

Recommended plan

![Image 2](https://www.iubenda.com/assets/site/products/essentials-tier-icon-1e00de209b9911cd61668d1cd2e5050f6bd813eb3c251fb6e6f7b3cc8a12d763.svg)

Essentials
----------

$5.99

per site/app, per month when billed annually

* * *

Choose

Recommended plan

![Image 3](https://www.iubenda.com/assets/site/products/advanced-tier-icon-9f87f0d11c11768e99877b26b7cbff3b7186b04e680b975360b8c4558f3659a0.svg)

Advanced
--------

$24.99

per site/app, per month when billed annually

* * *

Choose

Recommended plan

![Image 4](https://www.iubenda.com/assets/site/products/ultimate-tier-icon-fc66db2a401e07b50f28a8f988d486e2c94297ec3805356c8a73c4bc3caca120.svg)

Ultimate
--------

$99.99

per site/app, per month when billed annually

* * *

Choose

14-day money-back guarantee

![Image 5](https://www.iubenda.com/assets/site/products/pricing-legal-docs-icon-e067b2afe362089291e559083289d081d8568d049e7fbbbabd0d521fb85d57eb.svg)

Legal Documents for your Websites and Apps
------------------------------------------

**Privacy Policy, Cookie Policy** and **Terms & Conditions** – customizable from thousands of options that are updated if the law changes

### Included in all plans:

**Privacy Policy and Cookie Policy Generator** – choose from thousands of ready-made, lawyer-crafted clauses (with built-in cookie and tracker mapping)

**Autofill legal documents** based on the characteristics of your site or app

**Legal documents updated** if the law or requirements change

* * *

* * *

### Starter

*   Up to **7 third-party services and clauses** can be added to the Privacy and Cookie Policy
*   **All** third-party services and clauses available
*   **Full** iubenda branding
*   **One** language
*   **Basic integration** of documents in your site or app

* * *

### Essentials

*   Up to **20 third-party services and clauses** can be added to the Privacy and Cookie Policy
*   **All** third-party services and clauses available
*   **Minimal** iubenda branding
*   **One** language
*   **Basic integration** of documents in your site or app

* * *

### Advanced

*   Up to **30 third-party services and clauses** can be added to the Privacy and Cookie Policy
*   **All** third-party services and clauses available
*   **Minimal** iubenda branding
*   **All** available languages
*   Add **custom text** to your Privacy and Cookie Policy
*   **Terms & Conditions** - choose from hundreds of ready-made clauses.  
    Ability to integrate via **API**
*   **Seamless integration** of documents in your site or app

* * *

### Ultimate

*   **Unlimited third-party services and clauses** that can be listed in the Privacy and Cookie Policy
*   **All** third-party services and clauses available
*   **No** iubenda branding
*   **All** available languages
*   Add **custom text** to your Privacy and Cookie Policy
*   **Terms & Conditions** - choose from hundreds of ready-made clauses.  
    Ability to integrate via **API**
*   **Additional data-input fields** (describe in detail your data processing activities such as data retention and security measures)
*   **Seamless integration** of documents in your site or app

![Image 6](blob:http://localhost/2ae2cc6f0544e8fcceb52fb6a599a7ea)

Privacy Controls, Consent Notice and Cookie Banner
--------------------------------------------------

Display legal disclosures that adjust automatically based on relevant laws, easily control user  
privacy and consent settings, and maximize the use of personal data within the requirements of the law

### Included in all plans:

**Consent banner** structured to optimize consent rate while adhering to highest standards of compliance

**Privacy controls**, including opt-in controls and opt-out controls

Easy integration (including plugins for popular CMS platforms)

**Permanent database log of consent proofs** stored by iubenda (for both opt-in and opt-out actions)

One-click activation for Google Consent Mode and IAB Transparency & Consent Framework (TCF) to ensure your site remains compliant without affecting revenue.

* * *

* * *

### Starter

*   Up to **5,000** page views/mo
*   **Limited** style customization
*   **One** language
*   **Full** iubenda branding
*   **Google Consent Mode** support

* * *

### Essentials

*   Up to **25,000** page views/month included + $0.06 per 1000 extra page views
*   **Full** style customization
*   **One** language
*   **Minimal** iubenda branding
*   **Google Consent Mode** support

* * *

### Advanced

*   Up to **50,000** page views/month included + $0.06 per 1000 extra page views
*   **Full** style customization
*   **All** available languages
*   **Minimal** iubenda branding
*   **Google Consent Mode** support
*   **Geolocation-based consent settings** (e.g., request GDPR opt-in consent only from European users while offering opt-out consent for US-based users)

* * *

### Ultimate

*   Up to **150,000** page views/month included + $0.06 per 1000 extra page views
*   **Full** style customization
*   **All** available languages
*   **No** iubenda branding
*   **Google Consent Mode** support
*   **Native mobile app integration** with zero limitations
*   **Geolocation-based consent settings** (e.g., request GDPR opt-in consent only from European users while offering opt-out consent for US-based users)
*   **Detailed** analytics
*   **Recover users** that reject marketing tracking with inline prompts and more
*   **Cookie consent paywall**

![Image 7](blob:http://localhost/2ae2cc6f0544e8fcceb52fb6a599a7ea)

Compliance scanning
-------------------

### Included in all plans:

Get a **regular scan of your site** to detect compliance issues

Generate a **full compliance report** for your website

**Get notified** in case of issues

**Automatically map** first-party cookies and trackers

* * *

* * *

### Starter

*   Periodic scans not guaranteed.

* * *

### Essentials

*   **Monthly** site scanning of main pages

* * *

### Advanced

*   **Monthly** site scanning of main pages

* * *

### Ultimate

*   **Hourly** site scanning +  
    instant notification of any non-compliance detected

![Image 8](blob:http://localhost/2ae2cc6f0544e8fcceb52fb6a599a7ea)

Accessibility Solution
----------------------

Improve your website's accessibility for users with various disabilities — get closer to compliance with the European Accessibility Act (EAA) and other accessibility legislations, and align with web accessibility standards such as WCAG 2.1 guidelines without rebuilding your site from scratch.

### Included in all plans:

![Image 9:  ](blob:http://localhost/2ae2cc6f0544e8fcceb52fb6a599a7ea)

**AI-powered widget** that automatically optimizes your site's code for accessibility

![Image 10:  ](blob:http://localhost/2ae2cc6f0544e8fcceb52fb6a599a7ea)

**Text customization tools** for improved readability and font preferences

![Image 11:  ](blob:http://localhost/2ae2cc6f0544e8fcceb52fb6a599a7ea)

**Visual enhancement options** with contrast and color adjustment settings

![Image 12:  ](blob:http://localhost/2ae2cc6f0544e8fcceb52fb6a599a7ea)

**Navigation assistance features** for keyboard users and screen readers

![Image 13:  ](blob:http://localhost/2ae2cc6f0544e8fcceb52fb6a599a7ea)

**Content display controls** to reduce distractions and simplify viewing

* * *

* * *

### Starter

*   **Accessibility features usage:** $7/month for 10,000 page views

* * *

### Essentials

*   **Accessibility features usage:** $7/month for 10,000 page views

* * *

### Advanced

*   **Accessibility features usage:** $7/month for 10,000 page views

* * *

### Ultimate

*   **Accessibility features usage:** $7/month for 10,000 page views

![Image 14](blob:http://localhost/2ae2cc6f0544e8fcceb52fb6a599a7ea)

Centralized Consent Database
----------------------------

**Store proof of consent** + record and manage user consent preferences (e.g, for web forms and/or  
newsletters) as legally required by Europe's GDPR, Brazil's LGPD, and California's CCPA as amended by the CPRA. Ensure liability  
coverage in case of breach of contract

* * *

* * *

### Starter

*   **Storage of proof of consent for cookies and trackers**: included
*   **Storage of proof of consent for forms and other cases**: $6/month for every 1,000 new consents saved (starting from the first recorded consent)
*   Newsletter Opt-in Booster \- Collect and manage newsletter signups through a double opt-in process.

* * *

### Essentials

*   **Storage of proof of consent for cookies and trackers**: included
*   **Storage of proof of consent for forms and other cases**: $6/month for every 1,000 new consents saved (starting from the first recorded consent)
*   Newsletter Opt-in Booster \- Collect and manage newsletter signups through a double opt-in process.

* * *

### Advanced

*   **Storage of proof of consent for cookies and trackers**: included
*   **Storage of proof of consent for forms and other cases**: $6/month for every 1,000 new consents saved (starting from the first recorded consent)
*   Newsletter Opt-in Booster \- Collect and manage newsletter signups through a double opt-in process.

* * *

### Ultimate

*   **Storage of proof of consent for cookies and trackers**: included
*   **Storage of proof of consent for forms and other cases**: $6/month for every 1,000 new consents saved (starting from the first recorded consent)
*   Newsletter Opt-in Booster \- Collect and manage newsletter signups through a double opt-in process.

![Image 15](blob:http://localhost/2ae2cc6f0544e8fcceb52fb6a599a7ea)

Register of data processing activities
--------------------------------------

**Document and map how you process/store/manage personal data**. This is a GDPR, LGPD and FADP requirement and is key to addressing data breaches and keeping track of personal data access

* * *

* * *

### Starter

*   Not included

* * *

### Essentials

*   Not included

* * *

### Advanced

*   Not included

* * *

### Ultimate

*   Included

![Image 16](blob:http://localhost/2ae2cc6f0544e8fcceb52fb6a599a7ea)

Whistleblowing Management Tool
------------------------------

Collect and manage whistleblower reports and build an internal reporting channel as required by the EU Whistleblower Directive for organizations with 50+ EU employees.

* * *

* * *

### Starter

*   Not included

* * *

### Essentials

*   Not included

* * *

### Advanced

*   Not included

* * *

### Ultimate

*   Included

![Image 17](blob:http://localhost/2ae2cc6f0544e8fcceb52fb6a599a7ea)

Data Subject Rights Management Tool
-----------------------------------

Efficiently handle and process data subject requests by establishing a dedicated submission channel to guarantee compliance with the GDPR and other global privacy regulations.

* * *

* * *

### Starter

*   Not included

* * *

### Essentials

*   Not included

* * *

### Advanced

*   Not included

* * *

### Ultimate

*   Included

We monitor all the major global legislations
--------------------------------------------

### European legislation

GDPR (incl. UK GDPR), ePrivacy / Cookie law, Switzerland’s FADP, national DPA guidelines, national consumer laws

### US legislation

California’s CCPA and CPRA, Virginia’s VCDPA [and more](https://www.iubenda.com/en/help/111288-us-state-privacy-laws-overview)

### Brazil’s legislation

Brazil’s LGPD (Lei Geral de Proteção de Dados)

Looking for basic compliance and have less than  
1000 page views a month?

Try out the **FREE** plan

Best for agencies

Looking for a quantity discount?
--------------------------------

Get up to 50% discounts starting from the 26th site or app in your account. Get a volume deal if your site manages millions of page views or tens of thousands of new consents per month.

*   Dedicated agency support
*   Ready-made material to communicate with your clients
*   Dedicated features

Best for Enterprises and Large websites or apps

Looking for a tailored offer?
-----------------------------

If you represent a large organization, your total page views or mobile users are in the millions or you process a significant number of consents per month, get in touch with our sales team to get an offer tailored to your needs.

*   Dedicated support
*   Assisted onboarding

### Trusted by over 140,000 clients in 100+ countries

### FAQs

#### General

*   ##### Why am I paying on a yearly/monthly basis and not only once?
    
    Instead of paying one-off attorney fees of up to thousands of dollars (not to mention legal translation costs) to update your documents every time the law changes, our convenient subscription options give you access to timely updates that are drafted and vetted by our teams of international lawyers. This is our way of keeping your costs low while giving you access to attorney-level quality and peace of mind.
    
*   ##### How does the Extra Usage feature work?
    
    iubenda provides **Extra Usage** for its paid plans. This is applied to the Privacy Controls and Cookie Solution (for page views).
    
    If you reach the limit of use for your plan, the **Extra Usage** allows the product to continue working with an extra charge, please see the [pricing page](https://www.iubenda.com/en/pricing) for more details.
    
*   ##### What payment options are there?
    
    You can pay by credit card or PayPal.
    
*   ##### What about refunds?
    
    Request your refund by 14 days after your purchase or renewal, no questions asked!
    
*   ##### Is Google Consent Mode support included in all plans?
    
    Yes, it's included in all plans, even the Free one. Essential for websites running Google Ads or Google Analytics and targeting European users, it prevents marketing data loss from rejected consent banners. Note: Starting March 2024, Google has incrementally mandated the use of Consent Mode for accessing audience personalization and measurement features in its services when targeting European users. More details [here](https://www.iubenda.com/en/google-consent-mode-v2-certified-cmp).
    

[Read full FAQs here →](https://www.iubenda.com/en/help/6633)

Not sure what plan you need?
----------------------------

Take this one-minute quiz to find out what legal requirements apply to you and how iubenda can help

Pick the right plan for you & get started in minutes. Privacy policies, consent management, ROPA, terms and more. 100k+ companies trust iubenda.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes both subscription-based tiers and usage-based charges for additional features.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Basic plan for small websites or apps.
features: Up to 7 third-party services and clauses
Up to 20 third-party services and clauses

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Advanced plan for larger websites or apps.
features: Up to 30 third-party services and clauses

extracted_content.content:
A complete set of solutions to make your website or app compliant with the law, on multiple languages and legislations

*   [Overview](https://www.iubenda.com/en/overview)
*   [Pricing](https://www.iubenda.com/en/pricing)

![Image 1: Privacy Policy icon](https://www.iubenda.com/assets/site/products/privacy_policy-6641fa252acadc2d7bbbb2ba7a127e9765cacbbb50f11264df6bcb68e657e81c.svg)

#### [Privacy and Cookie Policy Generator](https://www.iubenda.com/en/privacy-and-cookie-policy-generator)

Create your privacy and cookie policy in minutes.

Customizable from 2000+ clauses, available in up to 27 languages and automatically updated if the law changes, our generator allows you to create a legal document in minutes and seamlessly integrate it with your website or app.

*   [Features](https://www.iubenda.com/en/features#privacy-and-cookie-policy)
*   [Documentation and guides](https://www.iubenda.com/en/help/463-generate-privacy-policy)

![Image 2: Cookie Solution icon](https://www.iubenda.com/assets/site/products/cookie_solution-7c6de9a79e77ad5d6e4cc5bae39b4fc1ed83d7425fa260cb612ef4e86eec1493.svg)

#### [Privacy Controls and Cookie Solution](https://www.iubenda.com/en/cookie-solution)

Manage consent preferences for the ePrivacy, GDPR, CPRA (CCPA amendment) and LGPD. Integrated with the IAB TCF and CCPA Compliance Framework.

Our solution allows you to display a fully customizable cookie banner/consent banner, collect cookie consent, implement prior blocking (including auto-blocking), set advertising preferences, and more.

*   [Features](https://www.iubenda.com/en/features#cookie-solution)
*   [Documentation and guides](https://www.iubenda.com/en/help/1177-cookie-solution-getting-started)

![Image 3: Terms and Conditions icon](https://www.iubenda.com/assets/site/products/terms_and_conditions-b2ecac04071503f53269125183052405bee78d8199cd799047bf382eaf79e6c3.svg)

#### [Terms and Conditions Generator](https://www.iubenda.com/en/terms-and-conditions-generator)

Create your terms and conditions in minutes.

Customizable from hundreds of combinations, available in up to 15 languages, powerful and precise — our solution is capable of handling even the most complex, individual scenarios. Optimized for e-commerce, marketplace, SaaS, apps and more.

*   [Features](https://www.iubenda.com/en/features#terms-and-conditions)
*   [Documentation and guides](https://www.iubenda.com/en/help/19461-how-to-generate-terms-and-conditions)

* * *

![Image 4: Whistleblowing Management Tool icon](https://www.iubenda.com/assets/site/products/whistleblowing_management_tool-ac418c64cbbf6682be183ece94551a4d57d581829315827ab215e2b4e3bd1ed6.svg)

#### [Whistleblowing Management Tool](https://www.iubenda.com/en/whistleblowing-management-tool)

Provide an easy-to-use internal reporting channel as required by the EU Whistleblower Directive for organizations with 50+ employees. Instantly generate your forms to embed or print.

Collect and manage whistleblower reports from employees and other individuals connected to your organization while safeguarding their identities and ensuring confidentiality. Tailored for EU businesses and global organizations dedicated to ethical transparency.

*   [Features](https://www.iubenda.com/en/features#whistleblower)
*   [Documentation and guides](https://www.iubenda.com/en/help/141269-eu-whistleblower-directive-guide-iubenda-tool)

![Image 5: Consent Solution icon](https://www.iubenda.com/assets/site/products/consent_solution-aa3b8ec9c422f9c7b1c30bf3ec445232ea3c36df666784b2add0329bf1dcc1bf.svg)

![Image 6: IPM icon](https://www.iubenda.com/images/site/products/ipm.svg)

#### [Register of Data Processing Activities](https://www.iubenda.com/en/internal-privacy-management)

Document all the data processing activity within your organization.

To comply with privacy laws, and particularly the GDPR, companies need to record how they store and use the data they collect from their users. Our solution allows you to easily document all the data processing activities within your organization.

*   [Features](https://www.iubenda.com/en/features#internal-privacy-management)
*   [Documentation and guides](https://www.iubenda.com/en/help/6311-internal-privacy-management-getting-started)

iubenda is your 360° compliance solution for global data privacy laws. Privacy policy generator, cookie consent management, ROPA, Terms and more.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: The pricing details are not explicitly listed in the provided content. Users are directed to the pricing page for detailed information.
